error.signature: Action execution failed: The action failed because either the action owner or the action provider is not valid

verdict.summary: A CodePipeline action stage failed due to provider misconfiguration, IAM issues, or downstream service errors.

dead_ends.action: Delete and recreate the entire pipeline
dead_ends.why_fails: The failure is usually in the action configuration, not the pipeline itself; recreation loses history

dead_ends.action: Retry the pipeline without investigating which action failed
dead_ends.why_fails: Configuration errors are deterministic and will fail again on retry

workarounds.action: Check the failed action's execution details and error message
Verify the pipeline service role has permissions for all action providers
workarounds.how: Ensure CodePipeline role can access CodeBuild, S3, ECS, Lambda, or whatever action providers are configured

leads_to.condition: Pipeline retry triggers another CodeBuild run that also fails

preceded_by.condition: CodeBuild failure causes the pipeline action to fail

frequently_confused_with.distinction: CodeBuild failure is the build itself failing; CodePipeline action failure is the orchestration layer reporting a stage failed
